---
category: news
title: "VW To Buy $4 Billion Worth Of Self-Driving Tech From Israel’s Innoviz"
excerpt: "Volkswagen will purchase autonomous driving software and hardware from Israel’s Innoviz Technologies in a $4 billion deal. The deal has been inked with VW’s CARIAD technologies group and will include components such as laser-based lidar sensors the Volkswagen Group will use for its advanced driver assistance systems and automated vehicles from mid-decade."
